name: Offroad Legends Sahara
description:
Taste the deadly dunes of Sahara with powerful off-road machines. Hit the gas and climb up to the top of the world! Do you have what it takes to survive this hell?

Features:
- Incredible offroad vehicles
- Gorgeous graphics
- Real-time vehicle deformation
- Precise physics simulation
- Retina display support for iPad and iPhone!
- Challenging tracks


Fasten your seat belts, it's gonna be a tough ride!
